channel.title: [release]Shikai, Keening, and Red Queen Sword[release]
channel.description:
Hey, releasing my second-fourth models made from scratch. Here's some in-game pics:
Shikai: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/ashikaiweild.jpg[/img]
Keening: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/akeeningweild.jpg[/img]
Red Queen Sword: [IMG]http://i553.photobucket.com/albums/jj374/AD_Setsuna/aredqueenswordweild.jpg[/img]
They look and work good in game as you can see. :)
Download link (INITS INCLUDED): http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=530badc8f1cb6ae341446e35a78dc463a4aa9b42a931ba56b8eada0a1ae8665a
Thanks!

item.title: [release]Shikai, Keening, and Red Queen Sword[release]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“smite range, post:23, topic:275680”][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=364156.msg2765627#msg2765627 date=1240780970]

[quote author=ak226688 link=topic=364156.msg2765588#msg2765588 date=1240778787]

[quote author=Setsuna link=topic=364156.msg2765195#msg2765195 date=1240762987]

Keening isn’t that big it’s just a dagger ripped from morrowind!

Now that you mention it, i remember seeing it on Morrowind! I bet all of these are from morrowind or Oblivion!

No, only Keening. And who cares…?..

Looks better bigger in my opinion.
[/quote]im ashamed

And why is that.
[/quote][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=364156.msg2765195#msg2765195 date=1240762987]

Keening isn’t that big it’s just a dagger ripped from morrowind!

Now that you mention it, i remember seeing it on Morrowind! I bet all of these are from morrowind or Oblivion!

No, only Keening. And who cares…?..

Looks better bigger in my opinion.
[/quote]im ashamed

And why is that.
[/quote]you havent made a v2 of any of them =[ it makes me upset

I’ll make V2 of them in a little bit, working on learning how to animate armour and stuff…

off topic- you trying make longest quote?
on-topic i likve the 3rd 1 =P[/quote]
Hey nice gravedig. Why bump such a pointless thing to say that.

Read full topic
